reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 30/02: CONSOLIDATING MATTERS OR HEARING THEM TOGETHER
reg_info.reg_name_text: CONSOLIDATIng matters OR HEARING them TOGETHER
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 30/02: CONSOLIDATING MATTERS OR HEARING THEM TOGETHER
reg_info.act_under: Ontario Municipal Board Act   Loi sur la Commission des affaires municipales de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. If the Board considers that two or more matters are related to each other by common facts, issues, questions of law or for any other reason, it may, (a) order the matters be consolidated, heard at the same time or heard one immediately after the other; or (b) stay or adjourn any matter until the determination of any other matter.  O. Reg. 30/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. If the Board considers that two or more matters are related to each other by common facts, issues, questions of law or for any other reason, it may,

(a) order the matters be consolidated, heard at the same time or heard one immediately after the other; or

(b) stay or adjourn any matter until the determination of any other matter.  O. Reg. 30/02, s. 1.

content.content: 2. An order that proceedings be heard at the same time or one immediately after the other does not affect the discretion of the Board panel at the hearing to order otherwise.  O. Reg. 30/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. An order that proceedings be heard at the same time or one immediately after the other does not affect the discretion of the Board panel at the hearing to order otherwise.  O. Reg. 30/02, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 30/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 30/02, s. 3.
